channel.title: Comments on: Theology Matters: The Threefold Division of the Law

item.title: By: Robert Briggs
item.dc:creator: Robert Briggs
item.description: Enjoyable soundbite guys. At some point could you address a little more the distinction between the 'work of the law' written on the hearts of all men by nature, and 'the law written on the heart' in regeneration? In my reading over the years this is an issue that is not always clearly dealt with. It would be helpful to lay out the difference between the two states and then tie it into the perpetuity of moral law in the state of grace.
